text.text: Wow! You're an expert on the Lost Worlds mod now! For some on-field experence, look to the next few books, all of which can be purchased from villagers.
Field Guide: The prefect guide to each creature! With each discovery, a new page is added!
Book of Archaeology: The prefect guide to exploring ancient civilizations! With each discovery, a new page is added!
Ancient Herbs: The prefect guide to ancient plants! With each discovery, a new page is added!
